data.title: What Animal Crossing Wii U could look like (TheBitBlock)
data.meta_description: TheBitBlock just launched a new Make Believe series where they reimagine existing Nintendo series in new ways. First up is a  pretty amazing  first episode...
data.text:
Dec 5, 2015

#1

TheBitBlock just launched a new Make Believe series where they reimagine existing Nintendo series in new ways. First up is a pretty amazing first episode on how Animal Crossing might look & play if it came to the Wii U, with more Animal Crossing episodes to come. The detail here is amazing, featuring custom models, textures, and music.

Episode 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wt1LHFlBO6M

Check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wt1LHFlBO6M, with more parts apparently coming soon
